nodes.text: "Your Love is Gravy" was a hit song by the Gallusian singer Luleo Primoc, who was a singing superstar prior to the outbreak of the Clone Wars.

"Your Love is Gravy" was created by author Adam Bray for the 2019 reference book Ultimate Star Wars, New Edition. As the song preformed by Primoc in Solo: A Star Wars Story, "Chicken in the Pot," already made reference to the visual similarities between the Gallusian and a cooked chicken, Bray expanded on the theme with the new song names in the book.
